caption: Food and service was excellent!!
(Translated by Google) Spectacular 👌  (Original) Espectacular 👌
One of my favorite places to get lunch when in Brooklyn! I highly recommend everyone to try the Prosciutto Panini. For more food suggestions, follow my Instagram account @dommiegavone
Go for the  pizza 🍕!  STAY FOR THE OLD MEN IN  FUR COAT
This is the best pizza in Brooklyn. All of their pies, food, wines, the best. And great prices too.
Great service and great food  !
Great food
They need better workers and not rude.But the foods here good.
Very friendly staff and excellent food served in an actual garden in the back.
Food is great and the services is excellent as well I definitely recommend this restaurant Grilled octopus and the meat and cheese board are excellent
Delicious and cozy, staff is super friendly! Wood burning fire and panini to die for !!!
Always love this place. Great food, servers have been there for years.

I usually never leave reviews but never Judge a book by its cover . I usually stick to carribean cuisine but today I decided to try something new and it was delectable. My God sister and I had the Garlic bread and it’s far from your traditional garlic bread ! The quality of cheese is superb with the herbs and then the cook in the brick oven is wonderful. The salad is perfectly  dressed and the shrimp is amazing . The pizza is literally one of the best since I moved to New York . So thin and flavorful and the prices are so decent for the great quality of food and service you receive, the waitress was so inviting .  The only negative I would say is I ordered salmon and it was a little burnt which left a light bitter taste BUT I calmly removed it  but the bread crumb stuffing is delicious with a touch of lemon to balance the earthy essence of the fish  ! Table side you get bread olive oil , parmesan cheese and balsamic vinaigrette  . (Tip )when you get the bread for a starter drizzle some olive oil and dip in Parmesan cheese one of my Favorite restaurants now . Will definitely be back .
As always, fantastic pizza, and lovely backyard dining.
Been ordering pizza for delivery from here during Covid. Very good pizza!
Lol, I thought this was Marco Polo...whatever, the food was really good.  Will return
Pizza and salads were great!
Warm ambiance, beautiful pizza oven and bar. Friendly and efficient service. We recommend the Apple Salad, crisp and fresh, the pizza, and the great wine selections (the Sangiovese treated us right).
Great food
Great Italian food.
Enoteca’s pizzas are really good, their location is good, and their service is really good. Their pizza has the best flavor.
Always have a fun time with delicious food
Service and ambiance.  The food was delicious.
Enjoyed a wonderful dinner here, great service and atmosphere.
Delicious and quick and reasonable.   We ate at the bar and had amazing personal pizzas for a yummy bite.
One of our favorite pizza places in all of New York. Great food, wine, service, and the company is always top notch
perfect food!!!
Small place. Overall, the food was good.  The waiter seemed confused when I told him that I was celiac. That made me uneasy and i asked a lot of questions. This seemed to annoy him.
Sit at the bar, have a glass of montepulciano, and just enjoy.
Excellent place to grab some food when in a hurry. Their service is swift, pricing is affordable, excellent mood. Will visit here again

Hands down one of the best and most affordable pizza in Brooklyn, NY! Delighted by their friendly waitress and amazing bartender who got to know me and my boyfriend. They have a hidden deal that many don’t know, which is if you sit at the bar you can have a beer and personal pie for $5. Their pizza, paninis, entrees are just as amazing! One of my favorite pie is lucana. Favorite panini is bistecca. Favorite wood burning entree is octopus.
(Translated by Google) Awesome  (Original) Eccezionale
Perfect for date night. Great food, great wine selection, great service.
(Translated by Google) It eats very well! 👍  (Original) Se come muy bien! 👍
Great pizza
The food is o.k
The best pizza 👌 in town, and the price is more than fair. Plenty of choices from the menu, excellent professional staff. Highly recommend for a brunch with friends
This is a mediocre Italian restaurant. Mediocre pizza mediocre styling. Mediocre wait staff, mediocre music. Mediocre coffee. If you want average. This place is perfect.
Edable, but not great
Great Food n Service
Not crowded and good food!
Excellent food and ambiance.
We finished our 6 small plates and a pizza.  All were delicious and the wine was inexpensive and perfect for the food.
The food here is always good. Consistency is key! You can't beat any of their menu items - and the $5 draft beer + baby pizza special is too legit to quit!

This review is only based on the food and the service  because the dinner was offered to me so I have know idea how much was the price. The quality of the food is good and the service is really nice. The owner of the place is there and asks if everything is ok and if can help. Great waiters /waitresses : they are educate and do their job really well.

A true neighborhood gem. This sister restaurant to Marco Polo is a weekly favorite. Much more accessible than Lucali, and nearly as wonderful. They offer a lot more options for a full meal, ranging from beautiful salads, fish, meat, pasta and great pizza toppings. As this to your list of places to try!

I grew up in Brooklyn and now live in San Francisco. Generally I miss Brooklyn, but places like this make me nostalgic and want to hurry back. Went with my mom and had a great meal. Tender and simply flavored, the wood oven roasted squid was the best I've ever had!  With spot-on crust, the pizzas we're delicious too. Nothing beats a traditional family run restaurant with deep community roots, a modern menu, friendly staff and simply wonderful food. Thanks for a great experience with mom.
Excellent food that is fairly priced. Staff goes all out to make sure everything is perfect.  A MUST VISIT.

Lovely neighborhood Italian restaurant in Carrol Gardens.  Staff was attentive, the beet salad was outstanding and the  large vegetarian pizza was simply delicious.  Locals we're friendly.  A real gem.  Can't wait to go back and try the rest of the menu.
Delicious food..Great service with a smile...portions tended to be smallish..almost Tapas size..We were hungry ..
Pizza is amazing.
Amazing food and atmosphere, definitely will be back

Wow, what a letdown. Had takeout before from here 6 months ago but tonight they've really dipped in quality : I don't think I've ever had a worst pizza in my life. Quattro formaggi large. First: pizzas are so thin you wonder how it's even scientifically possible. Second: So it's thin crust, so what? Well the problem is there was almost no cheese on my four cheese pizza. There was about one crumble of blue cheese , a lot of mozzarella, and I'm pretty sure nothing else. Third:You could particularly tell because they'd burned it so horribly that where there was no cheese (about 25% of the pizza) it was just black. Fourth: was "large", and yet my wife, kid and I ate it and had room for a second dinner. And we're skinny people.  Honestly, this place felt like a scam. We felt we'd paid $23 for burnt bread. Owners of this Pizzeria: stop cutting back on ingredients. It's making your pizzas horrible.
Good pizza and good prices, nice neighborhood spot.
Everything was amazing. Apple Salad, 🍅 + Mozzarella Salad, Veal Meatballs, and Lasagna. I highly recommend. Enjoy!
This is my favorite restaurant ,I've been coming here for a few years now and not once have I been disappointed 😊
I'd rather crawl naked through broken glass than have another drink here. Would definitely visit again.
Excellent food. Courteous service.
Food not good
(Translated by Google) Excellent food, warm and welcoming atmosphere, courteous and friendly staff.  (Original) Cibo ottimo, atmosfera calda e accogliente, personale cortese e friendly.
Fantastic food at great prices
Great pizza! Pastas were also good but portions were a little small.
Good service and nice staff, pizza was amazing!
Great service,  good food...

Great pizza. I haven't had much else to try besides the pizza and salad. The restaurant is decent sized and there is a small bar area in the front. There is also outside seating in the back. The prices are fair and the staff is friendly. Definitely worth checking out.
Excellent food and service..back patio enclosure
Friendly staff. Delicious food
Good food, good service, good prices.
Excellent food great service and prices
No need to compromise the quality of pizza just to feed the kids before they melt down from running around in the park. This place has sick pizza and the rest of the menu is delicious!
Great menu offerings, and seriously amazing wine selections.
Best.
Best Pizza and other Italian delights lov it!! You will be so happy you did the service is excellent! Trust me I visit very often!!!
Pleasant ambiance,  the broccoli soup was smooth and velvety - enjoyed the no cream option. Pleasant staff and a varied selection of wines.
We ate lunch here and boy was it good. I had procusso, cheese, and bell pepper on pizza bread and it was delicious.
Amazing
It is amazing I've gone there since I was a baby it is one of my favorite restaurants
Best personal pizza in Brooklyn.
Always a good bet. Yummy Italian fair from a wood fired oven.
Everything very good and fresh..great Sicilian wine
Great food, great price and awesome atmosphere

I stopped by here on a late afternoon for some linner and ordered 2 regular pies. When you walk in the first thing you see is the huge brick oven. The pizza was being pumped out fresh order by order. We sat down quick and ordered a Lucana and Pistachio. We didn't get to try any appetizers or main courses but they sounded delectable.  Once the pizza arrived, the first thing I noticed was...TOPPINGS! This is one of the first pizza shops that actually put sausage on their sausage pies, they don't skimp on the toppings. That's key in pizza, you don't want to order a sausage pie with 1 sausage, you wants lots of sausage pieces.  Both pizzas were fantastic and loaded with toppings. The only downside was, the center of the crust wasn't crunchy and got a little soggy. I wish they would've toasted the center a little longer. The crust along the edges were however delicious.
Fresh, remarkable pizza.
Excellent food, wine and service. Friendly atmosphere and warm ambiance.
My favorite brick-oven restaurant,  good food comfortable atmosphere.
Its an okay place.
Absolutely great pizza and vibe. Don't miss the small plates, many treasures there
Good pizza
Nice place for lunch or early dinner. Ample indoor and outdoor dining with attentive friendly staff.
The pizza is so good.
I love their pizza and beer deal. $5 for a personal 5'' pizza and a pint. And the pizza is already perfect.
Have visited more than once, and every time it's PERFECT!
Good pizza in a great gowanas location
Really great pizza and salads. Also a nice atmosphere in the restaurant.

(Translated by Google) It is a casual place with a variety of wines to taste and exquisite Italian food.  (Original) Es un lugar casual con gran variedad de vinos para degustar y exquisita comida italiana.

I love this restaurant!!! The place is very cute and has delicious food and wine! We've only ever sat in the bar, so I cannot speak to the dinning room experience, but I assume it's just as tentative and friendly. Do yourself a favor and order the prosciutto, truffle, pistachio pizza, it's to die for. The second or third time we came here we noticed the owner/manager wearing sport coat attending to all of the guests making sure everyone was enjoying themselves. I'm always impressed when owners or managers are so hands on because it's not always the case. Bravo my friend! This place is one of my favorite local joints.
The perfect mix of local restaurant and delicious food. Waitstaff is always super friendly and the Pugliese Pizza is awesome. Very family friendly.
Great food, great service.  Real neighborhood place.
Modern and healthy
I particularly appreciate the proper portion sizing. Everything is superb. A wonderful mix on each course.
Great spot for food and drinks
Great thin crust pizza! They have happy hour specials at the bar.
What a wonderful experience! The food was excellent, the service was first class and the ambiance was great. They made us feel like family.
Love their food! Prosciutto pizza is something! Brick oven does miracles!
Great thin crust pies, though the real steal here is the $8 baked ziti dish. The Rughetta salad is a perfect starter.
Great NY style Italian cuisine!
$5 for any draft beer and a fresh personal brick oven margherita pie... I can't really ask for more

Great food, wonderful service and ambiance.  Terrific value. Have to go back. I had perfectly cooked margarita pizza. Son had juicy lasagne. We shared large mozzarella salad with bread from their brick oven. Waiter refilled water glass frequently without my asking. Authentic Italian cuisine.
Love it the pizza its outstanding nice cosy and comfortable relaxing
Good cheap Italian food in the Cobble Hill area.

The menu looked so varied that I was hoping to love this neighborhood spot, but was sadly underwhelmed. The chicken sausage dish was dry, and with an odd mix of flavors that were not cohesive. The balsamic vinaigrette that accompanied the salad was so thick and sweet it was inedible.

A true Italian restaurant on Court, where the aromas from the oven draw you in. The oven also casts a warm glow throughout the place, making you feel toasty and comfortable. The food was delicious and soothing - I had the seafood soup and the tasty gnocchi. They also had a great wine list. The warm, authentic service was excellent as well.
